Description: For images printed from the same plate, arranged in three rows; at top, Holy Family after Schiavone, below at left St Gregory at prayers after Carracci, at right Dead Christ with the Maries after Carracci, and below Repose in Egypt after Carracci; unfinished proofs before letters. Etching
Producer name: Print made by: William Henry Worthington
Curator's comments: See 1860,0211.342 for published state of 'Dead Christ with the Maries' from the 'Stafford Gallery' series; the painting was wrongly attributed to Lodovico instead of Annibale Carracci. See Comment of 1874,0808.938 for information about Carracci's alterpiece of St Gregory.
Associated names: Representation of: St John the Evangelist
Representation of: St Gregory the Great
